mapper.sql: id, city_name, type, display_words, display_pic, action_type, action_url, activity_id, description, add_time, update_time, state, os, del_flag, display_time, del_time, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, version_limit, is_download, download_type, ios_versions, android_versions, sort, show_type, gif_countdown, is_ad, download_way, download_id, district_ids, ios_version_ids, android_version_ids, ad_channel_id
mapper.select:
select
from t_app_display where (city_name LIKE concat('%',#{cityName},'%') OR city_name = 'default') AND NOW() BETWEEN display_time AND del_time AND os in (0,3) AND del_flag=0 AND `type`=5 AND action_type=2 AND is_ad != 1 ORDER BY sort DESC
